name: Lemberg Solutions
tag_list: iphone, android, blackberry, ipad, mobile-development, destination-apps, elearning-apps, healthcare-apps, community-apps, messaging-apps, web-development, drupal, n2cms, kohana, codeigniter, html5
overview:
A mobile and web development company with broad proven experience, Lemberg Solutions Limited acts as a technology partner for software product owners, startups, design agencies, consulting and marketing agencies.

Registered in the UK since 2007, Lemberg has greatly expanded its activity, involving cutting-edge technologies and creative, experienced, high-qualified specialists.

Strong work ethics, honesty, constant improvement, attention to detail and quality of work have always been the core values of the company.

We believe in becoming completely dedicated to each project we carry out with our clients. We commit ourselves to the ideas and strategies and strive to deliver solutions above and beyond what is expected of us.

Our Benefits:

  • “one stop shop” (expertise in complex solutions with various technologies and platforms involved)
  • niche experience
  • high quality white-label solutions
  • cross-platform mobile development
  • product development experience
  • take on challenging projects
  • clarity of project estimation and reporting (reduction of risk and uncertainty)
  • professional management team (personal assistance: account managers and project managers)
  • convenient payment options ( per-project or per-hour)
  • work in compliance with UK law
